subject: Problems with my brake peddle
description_text:
Good Morning,
     I have your pedals and the brake started squeaking, I took it apart
and the brake rod is galling the shaft that it rides on.  I have attached
my invoice from Amazon and photos of the problem parts.  Can you please
send me a new shaft and brake rod?  If the shaft is just replaced it will
happen again so I need both parts.  Please let me know if you have any
questions.

Thank you!
Daniel Pick
W5071 Doering Dr.
Merrill WI 54452

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Pick,  Hello, the ZIP file you uploaded is incomplete and cannot be opened. You can send us a photo directly, and we will promptly provide the corresponding registration documents and a replacement.

Sorry about that, here are the photos.

On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 9:27 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Daniel Pick,  Here is the tracking number : SF6047080609372. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/ or https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
